headline: 3 Stocks Estimated To Be Trading At Discounts Of Up To 48.8%
summary: Recent developments in the U.S. stock market have been marked by volatility, with major indices such as the Dow Jones and S&P 500 experiencing declines amid geopolitical tensions and rising bond yields. In this environment, investors often seek opportunities in undervalued stocks that may be trading at significant discounts, offering potential for growth when market conditions stabilize.

headline: ESTUARY POWER ACHIEVES FINAL COMPLETION OF ESCAPE SOLAR AND STORAGE PROJECT AND BEGINS SUPPLYING MGM RESORTS INTERNATIONAL
summary: Estuary Power achieved final completion of all phases of its Escape Solar and Storage project in Lincoln County, Nevada in December 2025. Escape is now supplying 185 megawatts ("MW") of solar energy and 400 megawatt-hours ("MWh") of battery storage capacity to four Nevada customers.
